00040 #ifndef TRANSFORM_H_
00041 #define TRANSFORM_H_
00042 
00043 #include <iostream>
00044 
00045 #include "Matrix4x4.h"
00046 #include "Ptr.h"
00047 
00048 struct Point3D;
00049 struct Vector3D;
00050 struct NormalVector;
00051 struct Ray;
00052 struct BBox;
00053 
00054 class Transform
00055 {
00056 public:
00057         Transform( );
00058         Transform( double mat[4][4] );
00059         Transform( const Ptr<Matrix4x4>& mdir );
00060         Transform( const Ptr<Matrix4x4>& mdir,  const Ptr<Matrix4x4>& minv );
00061         Transform( double t00, double t01, double t02, double t03,
00062                double t10, double t11, double t12, double t13,
00063                    double t20, double t21, double t22, double t23,
00064                    double t30, double t31, double t32, double t33 );
00065 
00066         Point3D operator()( const Point3D& point ) const;
00067         void operator()( const Point3D& point, Point3D& transformedPoint ) const;
00068         Vector3D operator()( const Vector3D& vector ) const;
00069         void operator()( const Vector3D& vector, Vector3D& transformedVector ) const;
00070         NormalVector operator()( const NormalVector& normal ) const;
00071         void operator()( const NormalVector& normal, NormalVector& transformedNormal ) const;
00072         Ray operator()( const Ray& ray ) const;
00073         void operator()( const Ray& ray, Ray& transformedRay ) const;
00074         BBox operator()( const BBox& bbox  ) const;
00075         void operator()( const BBox& bbox, BBox& transformedBbox  ) const;
00076         Transform operator*( const Transform& rhs ) const;
00077 
00078         bool operator==( const Transform& mat ) const;
00079 
00080         Ptr<Matrix4x4> GetMatrix() const {return m_mdir;}
00081         Transform Transpose() const;
00082         Transform GetInverse() const ;
00083         bool SwapsHandedness( ) const;
00084 
00085 private:
00086         Ptr<Matrix4x4> m_mdir;
00087         Ptr<Matrix4x4> m_minv;
00088 };
00089 
00090 Transform Translate( const Vector3D& delta );
00091 Transform Translate( double x, double y, double z);
00092 Transform Scale( double x, double y, double z );
00093 Transform RotateX( double angle );
00094 Transform RotateY( double angle );
00095 Transform RotateZ( double angle );
00096 Transform Rotate( double angle, const Vector3D& axis );
00097 Transform LookAt( const Point3D& pos, const Point3D& look, const Vector3D& up );
00098 
00099 std::ostream& operator<<( std::ostream& os, const Transform& tran );
00100 
00101 #endif /*TRANSFORMATION_H_*/
